attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having already caused mass uproar in the middle east by this ill thought out move and now under real threat of terror, the knighthood should be removed without delay as any terror attack on this nation in retaliation will be in the attackers mind totally justified as we are currently looking as if we are condoning what this 'idiotic' author wrote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
